channel.title: Python on Steven Golovkine
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Steven Golovkine

item.title: Joint Intent Classification and Slot Filling with Transformers
item.description: An implementation of Transformers for user query comprehension expressed in English in Keras.

item.title: Character-level Language Modeling with LSTMs
item.description: An implementation of LSTM network to create a character level language model using Keras.

item.title: Text classification using Neural Networks
item.description: An implementation of neural networks for text classification using Keras based on embeddings.

item.title: Classification and Localization model
item.description: An implementation of a classification and localisation network with Keras with several, heterogenous outputs.

item.title: Fully Convolutional Neural Networks
item.description: Implementation of a Fully Convolutional Network with Keras for weak segmentations on images.

item.title: ConvNet design
item.description: A comparison of different ConvNet design with Keras.

item.title: Fine Tuning a Pre-trained Deep CNN on a GPU Machine
item.description: How to fine-tuned the pre-trained ResNet50 model to do classification of images?

item.title: Convolutions
item.description: An introduction to convolutions with Keras.

item.title: Pretrained ConvNets with Keras
item.description: An introduction on image predictions and representations using ResNet50 on Keras.

item.title: Triplet Loss for Implicit Feedback Neural Recommender Systems
item.description: An introduction to bi-linear recsys using positive feedback data with Keras.

item.title: Explicit Feedback Neural Recommender Systems
item.description: An introduction to recommender data and recsys architecture using Keras.

item.title: Categorical Embeddings
item.description: An introduction to categorical embeddings using Keras.

item.title: Multilayer Neural Network in Tensorflow
item.description: An introduction to Tensorflow with the implementation of a digit classifier.

item.title: Backpropagation in Multilayer Perceptron with Numpy
item.description: An implementation of a real gradient descent and a multilayer perceptron using Numpy.

item.title: Introduction to Pretrained Models for Computer Vision
item.description: In particular, we are going to use the ResNet50, MobileNet and InceptionResNetV2 models for Image Classification and Mask-RCNN models for Instance Detection and Segmentation.

item.title: Introduction to Deep Learning with Keras
item.description: An introduction to neural network with the high level framework Keras and the famous MNIST dataset.

item.title: Lower Back Pain
item.description: Lower back pain can be caused by a variety of problems. How identify an abnormal or normal person using collected physical spine details and data?

item.title: Jupyter Notebook
item.description: Jupyter is a programming software which use notebooks widely used in data science.

item.title: Library Matplotlib
item.description: Matplotlib is a Python 2D plotting library.

item.title: Set up Python
item.description: Python is a programming language. It is used by a lot of people doing data science.
